00077 QVariant PortMapsModel::data(const QModelIndex& index, 
00078                                                          int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00079 
00080         if (!index.isValid())
00081                 return QVariant();
00082         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00083                 return QVariant();
00084 
00085         if (Qt::DisplayRole == role) {
00086 
00087                 switch (index.column()) {
00088                         
00089                         case 0: 
00090                                 if (table_.at(index.row()).logicalLeft_ >= 0)
00091                                         return table_.at(index.row()).logicalLeft_;
00092                                 return QString();
00093 
00094                         case 1:
00095                                 if (table_.at(index.row()).logicalRight_ >= 0)
00096                                         return table_.at(index.row()).logicalRight_;
00097                                 return QString();
00098 
00099                         case 2: 
00100                                 return table_.at(index.row()).logicalPort_;
00101 
00102                         case 3: 
00103 
00104                                 return table_.at(index.row()).physPort_;
00105 
00106                         case 4:
00107                                 if (table_.at(index.row()).physLeft_ >= 0)
00108                                         return table_.at(index.row()).physLeft_;
00109                                 return QString();
00110 
00111                         case 5:
00112                                 if (table_.at(index.row()).physRight_ >= 0)
00113                                         return table_.at(index.row()).physRight_;
00114                                 return QString();
00115 
00116                         default:
00117                                 return QVariant();
00118                 }
00119         }
00120         // the hint for sizes
00121         else if (Qt::SizeHintRole == role) {
00122 
00123                 // if item is for port name
00124                 if (index.column() == 2 || index.column() == 3) 
00125                         return QSize(200, 10);
00126                 else
00127                         return QSize(40, 10);
00128         }
00129         else if (Qt::ForegroundRole == role) {
00130 
00131                 // if invalid item
00132                 if (!isValid(table_.at(index.row())))
00133                         return QColor("red");
00134                 else
00135                         return QColor("black");
00136         }
00137         // if unsupported role
00138         else {
00139                 return QVariant();
00140         }
00141 }

00143 QVariant PortMapsModel::headerData(int section, 
00144                                                                    Qt::Orientation orientation, 
00145                                                                    int role /*= Qt::DisplayRole */ ) const {
00146 
00147         if (role == Qt::DisplayRole) {
00148 
00149                 // the horizontal headers
00150                 if ( orientation == Qt::Horizontal) {
00151                         switch (section) {
00152                                 case 0: 
00153                                         return tr("Logical\nleft");
00154                                 case 1:
00155                                         return tr("Logical\nright");
00156                                 case 2:
00157                                         return tr("Logical\nname");
00158                                 case 3:
00159                                         return tr("Physical\nname");
00160                                 case 4:
00161                                         return tr("Physical\nleft");
00162                                 case 5:
00163                                         return tr("Physical\nright");
00164                                 default:
00165                                         return QVariant();
00166                         }
00167                 }
00168 
00169                 // if orientation is not horizontal
00170                 return QVariant();
00171         }
00172         // if unsupported role
00173         else {
00174                 return QVariant();
00175         }
00176 }

00178 bool PortMapsModel::setData( const QModelIndex& index, 
00179                                                         const QVariant& value, 
00180                                                         int role /*= Qt::EditRole */ ) {
00181         
00182         if (!index.isValid())
00183                 return false;
00184         
00185 
00186         if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size() )
00187                 return false;
00188         
00189         if (Qt::EditRole == role) {
00190 
00191                 switch (index.column()) {
00192                         case 0: {
00193                                 // if the value is defined
00194                                 if (!value.toString().isEmpty())
00195                                         table_[index.row()].logicalLeft_ = value.toInt();
00196                                 // if value was empty
00197                                 else
00198                                         table_[index.row()].logicalLeft_ = -1;
00199                                 break;
00200                                         }
00201                         case 1: {
00202                                 // if the value is defined
00203                                 if (!value.toString().isEmpty())
00204                                         table_[index.row()].logicalRight_ = value.toInt();
00205                                 // if value was empty
00206                                 else
00207                                         table_[index.row()].logicalRight_ = -1;
00208                                 break;
00209                                         }
00210                         case 2: {
00211                                 table_[index.row()].logicalPort_ = value.toString();
00212                                 break;
00213                                         }
00214                         case 3: {
00215                                 table_[index.row()].physPort_ = value.toString();
00216                                 break;
00217                                         }
00218                         case 4: {
00219                                 // if the value is defined
00220                                 if (!value.toString().isEmpty())
00221                                         table_[index.row()].physLeft_ = value.toInt();
00222                                 // if value was empty
00223                                 else
00224                                         table_[index.row()].physLeft_ = -1;
00225                                 break;
00226                                         }
00227                         case 5: {
00228                                 // if the value is defined
00229                                 if (!value.toString().isEmpty())
00230                                         table_[index.row()].physRight_ = value.toInt();
00231                                 // if value was empty
00232                                 else
00233                                         table_[index.row()].physRight_ = -1;
00234                                 break;
00235                                         }
00236                 }
00237 
00238                 emit dataChanged(index, index);
00239                 return true;
00240         }
00241         // if unsupported role
00242         else {
00243                 return false;
00244         }
00245 }

00247 Qt::ItemFlags PortMapsModel::flags( const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00248 
00249         if (!index.isValid())
00250                 return Qt::NoItemFlags;
00251 
00252         // port names can't be edited
00253         else if (index.column() == 2 || index.column() == 3)
00254                 return Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable;
00255 
00256         return Qt::ItemIsEditable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable;
00257 }

00259 bool PortMapsModel::isValid() const {
00260 
00261         foreach (PortMapsModel::Mapping map, table_) {
00262                 if (!isValid(map))
00263                         return false;
00264         }
00265 
00266         // all ports were valid
00267         return true;
00268 }
00269 
00270 bool PortMapsModel::isValid( const Mapping& map ) const {
00271         // if either port name is empty
00272         if (map.logicalPort_.isEmpty() || map.physPort_.isEmpty())
00273                 return false;
00274 
00275         // if abstraction def is set and logical port is illegal 
00276         else if (absDef_ && absDef_->isIllegal(map.logicalPort_, interfaceMode_))
00277                 return false;
00278 
00279         // if abstraction def is set but port is not defined as optional or
00280         // required
00281         else if (absDef_ && 
00282                 !absDef_->isRequired(map.logicalPort_, interfaceMode_) &&
00283                 !absDef_->isOptional(map.logicalPort_, interfaceMode_))
00284                 return false;
00285 
00286         // if port is not found in component
00287         else if (!component_->hasPort(map.physPort_))
00288                 return false;
00289 
00290         // if one bound for logical port is defined but not the other
00291         else if (map.logicalLeft_ < 0 && map.logicalRight_ >= 0)
00292                 return false;
00293         else if (map.logicalLeft_ >= 0 && map.logicalRight_ < 0)
00294                 return false;
00295 
00296         // if one bound for physical port is defined but not the other
00297         else if (map.physLeft_ < 0 && map.physRight_ >= 0)
00298                 return false;
00299         else if (map.physLeft_ >= 0 && map.physRight_ < 0)
00300                 return false;
00301 
00302         // if port sizes don't match
00303         else if ((map.logicalLeft_ - map.logicalRight_) != (map.physLeft_- map.physRight_))
00304                 return false;
00305 
00306         // everything was ok
00307         else
00308                 return true;
00309 }
00310 
00311 void PortMapsModel::apply() {
00312 
00313         if (!portMaps_)
00314                 return;
00315 
00316         // remove the previous portmaps
00317         portMaps_->clear();
00318 
00319         foreach (PortMapsModel::Mapping mapping, table_) {
00320 
00321                 // create the port map
00322                 QSharedPointer<General::PortMap> map = QSharedPointer<General::PortMap>(new General::PortMap);
00323                 map->logicalPort_ = mapping.logicalPort_;
00324                 map->physicalPort_ = mapping.physPort_;
00325 
00326                 // if logical port should be vectored
00327                 if (mapping.logicalLeft_ >= 0 && mapping.logicalRight_ >= 0) {
00328                         map->logicalVector_ = QSharedPointer<Vector>(new Vector(
00329                                 mapping.logicalLeft_, mapping.logicalRight_));
00330                 }
00331 
00332                 // if physical port should be vectored
00333                 if (mapping.physLeft_ >= 0 && mapping.physRight_ >= 0) {
00334                         map->physicalVector_ = QSharedPointer<Vector>(new Vector(
00335                                 mapping.physLeft_, mapping.physRight_));
00336                 }
00337 
00338                 // save the map to port maps
00339                 portMaps_->append(map);
00340         }
00341 
00342 }
00343 
00344 void PortMapsModel::restore() {
00345         
00346         if (!portMaps_)
00347                 return;
00348 
00349         beginResetModel();
00350 
00351         // remove the previous items
00352         table_.clear();
00353 
00354         for (int i = 0; i < portMaps_->size(); ++i) {
00355                 
00356                 // create the mapping
00357                 PortMapsModel::Mapping mapping(portMaps_->at(i)->logicalPort_,
00358                         portMaps_->at(i)->physicalPort_);
00359 
00360                 // if logical port is vectored
00361                 if (portMaps_->at(i)->logicalVector_) {
00362                         mapping.logicalLeft_ = portMaps_->at(i)->logicalVector_->getLeft();
00363                         mapping.logicalRight_ = portMaps_->at(i)->logicalVector_->getRight();
00364                 }
00365 
00366                 // if physical port is vectored
00367                 if (portMaps_->at(i)->physicalVector_) {
00368                         mapping.physLeft_ = portMaps_->at(i)->physicalVector_->getLeft();
00369                         mapping.physRight_ = portMaps_->at(i)->physicalVector_->getRight();
00370                 }
00371 
00372                 // append the mapping to the table
00373                 table_.append(mapping);
00374 
00375         }
00376 
00377         endResetModel();
00378         emit contentChanged();
00379 }
00380 
00381 void PortMapsModel::onRemoveItems( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00382 
00383         if (!index.isValid())
00384                 return;
00385         else if (index.row() < 0 || index.row() >= table_.size())
00386                 return;
00387 
00388         QString physical = table_.at(index.row()).physPort_;
00389         bool physicalFound = false;
00390         QString logical = table_.at(index.row()).logicalPort_;
00391         bool logicalFound = false;
00392 
00393         beginRemoveRows(QModelIndex(), index.row(), index.row());
00394         
00395         // remove port map
00396         table_.removeAt(index.row());
00397         endRemoveRows();
00398 
00399         // check if either port is still found in another port map
00400         foreach (PortMapsModel::Mapping map, table_) {
00401                 if (map.logicalPort_ == logical)
00402                         logicalFound = true;
00403                 if (map.physPort_ == physical)
00404                         physicalFound = true;
00405         }
00406 
00407         // inform other models that ports that dont have mappings can be removed
00408         if (!logicalFound)
00409                 emit logicalRemoved(logical);
00410         if (!physicalFound)
00411                 emit physicalRemoved(physical);
00412         
00413         emit contentChanged();
00414 }
00415 
00416 void PortMapsModel::createMap( const QString& physicalPort, const QString& logicalPort ) {
00417         
00418         // both port names must be non-empty
00419         if (physicalPort.isEmpty() || logicalPort.isEmpty())
00420                 return; 
00421 
00422         beginInsertRows(QModelIndex(), table_.size(), table_.size());
00423         PortMapsModel::Mapping map(logicalPort, physicalPort);
00424 
00425         // if abs def is used
00426         if (absDef_) {
00427                 int size = absDef_->getPortSize(logicalPort, interfaceMode_);
00428 
00429                 // if size was specified
00430                 if (size >= 0) {
00431                         map.logicalLeft_ = size - 1;
00432                         map.logicalRight_ = 0;
00433                 }
00434         }
00435         // if the port is found on the component
00436         if (component_->hasPort(physicalPort)) {
00437                 int size = component_->getPortWidth(physicalPort);
00438 
00439                 if (size >= 0) {
00440                         map.physLeft_ = size - 1;
00441                         map.physRight_ = 0;
00442                 }
00443         }
00444 
00445         table_.append(map);
00446         endInsertRows();
00447         emit contentChanged();
00448 }

00455         }
00456         return list;

00468 void PortMapsModel::onRestoreItem( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00469 
00470         if (!index.isValid())
00471                 return;
00472 
00473         if (index.column() == 2) {
00474                 emit logicalRemoved(table_.at(index.row()).logicalPort_);
00475         }
00476         else if (index.column() == 3) {
00477                 emit physicalRemoved(table_.at(index.row()).physPort_);
00478         }
00479 }

00481 void PortMapsModel::setAbsType( const VLNV& vlnv, General::InterfaceMode mode ) {
00482 
00483         interfaceMode_ = mode;
00484 
00485         if (!vlnv.isValid()) {
00486                 absDef_ = QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition>();
00487                 return;
00488         }
00489 
00490         // ask library to parse the model for abstraction definition
00491         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComb;
00492         if (handler_->contains(vlnv)) 
00493                 libComb = handler_->getModel(vlnv);
00494 
00495         // if library did not contain the vlnv
00496         else
00497                 return;
00498 
00499         // make sure the model is for abstraction definition
00500         if (handler_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION)
00501                 absDef_ = libComb.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
00502 }
00503 
00504 bool PortMapsModel::canCreateMap( const QString& physicalPort, const QString& logicalPort ) const {
00505         // if port maps has been defined then check that signal directions match
00506         if (absDef_) {
00507                 General::Direction logicalDirection = 
00508                         absDef_->getPortDirection(logicalPort, interfaceMode_);
00509 
00510                 General::Direction physDirection = component_->getPortDirection(physicalPort);
00511 
00512                 // if directions don't match
00513                 if (logicalDirection != physDirection) {
00514                         emit errorMessage(tr("Directions between logical port \"%1\" and"
00515                                 " physical port \"%2\" didn't match.").arg(logicalPort).arg(physicalPort));
00516                         return false;
00517                 }
00518                 else
00519                         return true;
00520         }
00521         // if abstraction definition is not used ports can always be mapped
00522         else
00523                 return true;
00524 }
